to use against -> any : 1
use against any -> doubts : 1
against any doubts -> or : 1
any doubts or -> feelings : 1
doubts or feelings -> of : 1
or feelings of -> do : 1
feelings of do -> you : 1
you have that -> same : 1
have that same -> can : 1
that same can -> you : 1
same can you -> say : 1
can you say -> that : 1
you say that -> in : 1
say that in -> your : 1
in your career -> as : 1
as a reporter -> never : 1
a reporter never -> betrayed : 1
reporter never betrayed -> a : 1
never betrayed a -> cheated : 1
betrayed a cheated -> a : 1
a cheated a -> or : 1
cheated a or -> broken : 1
a or broken -> a : 1
or broken a -> promise : 1
broken a promise -> for : 1
a promise for -> the : 1
promise for the -> sake : 1
for the sake -> of : 1
the sake of -> a : 1
sake of a -> that : 1
a that never -> gone : 1
that never gone -> against : 1
never gone against -> your : 1
gone against your -> own : 1
against your own -> principles : 1
your own principles -> to : 1
own principles to -> further : 1
principles to further -> your : 1
further your that -> never : 1
your that never -> allowed : 1
that never allowed -> your : 1
never allowed your -> to : 1
allowed your to -> overshadow : 1
your to overshadow -> your : 1
to overshadow your -> reporter : 1
overshadow your reporter -> dropped : 1
your reporter dropped -> his : 1
reporter dropped his -> eyes : 1
eyes and frowned -> but : 1
and frowned but -> did : 1
frowned but did -> not : 1
but did not -> i : 1
did not i -> ask : 1
not i ask -> who : 1
i ask who -> is : 1
ask who is -> the : 1
is the bigger -> you : 1
the bigger you -> or : 1
